name: Limsod (itch)
description:
Limsod is an fps where you have to fight for your survival in a world infested with flesh-eating zombies. For your survival, you have at your disposal basic equipment that will allow you to face this horde of zombieuntil you are an exporter to a safe place.

__________________________________________________________________________

 Features so far :
  • Highly developed AI for zombies
  • 5 Different style of zombies with each one specified
  • +20 Maps to play and explore
  • +5 Gamemodes available
  • A complete level system with rewards
  • 15 Skins for your AK47 to acquire
  • Customizable lobby with music and wallpapers to acquire
  • Customizable player with multiple arms to acquire
  • +50 Quests to do
  • Complete options to change your game style to perfection
  • Supported languages : English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian, Japanese, Russian

__________________________________________________________________________

 System Requirements :

 - Minimal Configuration: (-60 fps)
CPU : Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600
GPU : NVIDIA 9800 GT
Memory : 4 Go de RAM
OS : Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64 bits
Disk : 7.17Go free space

 - Recommended Configuration: (~60 fps)
CPU : Intel Core i5-4460k 3,2 GHz
GPU : GTX 1050 Ti
Memory : 8 Go de RAM
OS : Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64 bits
Disk : 7.17Go free space

 - High Performance Configuration: (+120 fps)
CPU : Intel Core i7-9700k 4,9 GHz
GPU : GTX 1080 Ti
Memory : 8 Go de RAM
OS : Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64 bits
Disk : 7.17Go free space
